00057                                         NTBP_SGA_SCHNEIDMAN, // values used by Schneidman et al. (1998)
00058                                         NTBP_SGA_K_LLANO, // squid giant axon by Llano et al. (1988)

00097 NTreal UpdateTimeStep(NTreal newSuggestedTimeStep) { /* if (suggestedTimeStep > newSuggestedTimeStep) */ suggestedTimeStep = newSuggestedTimeStep; return newSuggestedTimeStep; }
00098 virtual NTreturn Step() { cerr << "NTBP_object_o:Step() - Warning : Non-overriden base method () called by derived class." << endl; return NT_NOT_IMPLEMENTED; }
00099 NTreturn StepNTBP() { timeStep = suggestedTimeStep; return NT_SUCCESS;}

00101 NTreal _baseTimeStep(){ return baseTimeStep;}
